991_1_08_25_14_25_08.input:
1. Screen Settings:

Set the canvas width to 700 and height to 400. Do not change the canvas size.

2. Object Motion & Parameter Settings:

Create a Vpython animation to illustrate the following physics experiment: A pendulum motion refers to the movement of an object that is suspended from a fixed pivot point and swings back and forth under the influence of gravity.

3. Cyber Input Variable Mapping Information:

(1) The Length of the Pendulum is mapped to the variable named Length_I with an initial value set to 5.

(2) When the value of Length_I changes, restart the animation from the beginning with the updated Length of the Pendulum.
(3) Do not import packages that are not supported by VPython such as numpy, math and time
